import { useState } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Layout from '../../components/Layout'; export default () => { const [moreIcon, setMoreIcon] = useState('fas fa-caret-right'); const x = () => { moreIcon === 'fas fa-caret-right' ? setMoreIcon('fas fa-caret-down') : setMoreIcon('fas fa-caret-right'); }; return ( {/* Bar which has steps to generate opinion poll */}

); };
